post.body: sorry didn't mean to freeze your browser. Merry Xmas, if you are still awake. Hope Santa was kind to you.

made it to atlanta.

San antonio airport provides free wifi. How kind of them.
Happy holidays to everyone. Hope no one is stuck in an airport.
Driving to San Antonio airport to catch a "Direct Flight" to Atlanta. Defeats the purpose of a direct flight if you have to drive 90mi,IMO.
